name: The Unyielding
description:
You play as the hero, cursed and weakened by the evil magician, gets weaker as you level down the dungeon. Fight to the end.

Hero starts with little health, it's highly recommended to find healing items before you get into fights.

The dungeon is randomly generated, and the game is still under developement, gaming experience may change grately.

由于邪恶法师的诅咒，主角的力量被严重削弱。每次进入地城时只有少量HP，在与敌人作战之前建议先寻找治疗道具

地图是随机生成的，且游戏处于早期开发阶段，后期版本可能有较大不同
